articles.title: Philippines signs biggest COVID-19 vaccine order with Pfizer - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: The Philippines ordered 40 million coronavirus vaccine doses from Pfizer Inc., the Southeast Asian nation’s biggest supply agreement as it fights one of the region’s worst outbreaks. The term sheet for the order has been signed, Carlito Galvez, who leads the …
